confirmed_task:
1. Start on the Homepage: http://da44b037-3c00-41d5-b935-bd6612be4804.pub.instances.scw.cloud:9980/  
Test Assertions: The homepage is displayed with the search field and category dropdown visible. 

2. Enter "bike" in the Keyword search field 
Test Assertions: The keyword "bike" is entered in the search field. 

3. Click on the "Search" button. 
Test Assertions: The search results page is displayed, showing listings containing the keyword "bike" in the title or description. 

4. Verify the total number of listings found is displayed. 
Test Assertions: The total number of listings found is 2562 on the results page 

5. Sort the search results by "Lower price first" 
Test Assertions: The listings are reordered, with the lowest-priced items appearing at the top. 

6. Verify that each listing shows a title, thumbnail image, price, location, and date posted. 
Test Assertions: All listings contain these details in the grid view.

1. Start on the Homepage: http://da44b037-3c00-41d5-b935-bd6612be4804.pub.instances.scw.cloud:9980/  
Test Assertions: The homepage is displayed with the search field and category dropdown visible. 

2. Enter "speaker" in the Keyword search field. 
Test Assertions: The keyword "speaker" is entered in the search field. 

3. Select "Musical instruments" from the Category dropdown. 
Test Assertions: The category "Musical instruments" is selected from the dropdown menu. 

4. Click on the "Search" button. 
Test Assertions: The search results page is displayed, showing listings that match both the keyword "speaker" and the "Musical instruments" category. 

5. Enter $200 in the Minimum Price field and $500 in the Maximum Price field. 
Test Assertions: The price range $200-$500 is entered in the price filter fields. 

6. Click on the "Apply" button to filter results by price. 
Test Assertions: The search results are filtered to show only listings with prices between $200 and $500. 

7. Verify that the filtered listings match the selected keyword, category, and price range. 
Test Assertions: Only listings with prices within the specified range and matching the keyword and category are displayed.

1. Start on the Homepage: http://da44b037-3c00-41d5-b935-bd6612be4804.pub.instances.scw.cloud:9980/  
Test Assertions: The homepage is displayed with the search field and category dropdown visible. 

2. Select "Books" from the Category dropdown. 
Test Assertions: The Category dropdown is set to "Books". 

3. Click on the "Search" button. 
Test Assertions: The “Books” listing page is displayed. 

4. Enter "Falls Church" in the City field. 
Test Assertions: The city "Falls Church" is entered in the City filter field. 

5. Click on the "Apply" button 
Test Assertions: Only classified ads located in Falls Church appear. 

6. Check the "Show only listings with pictures" checkbox. 
Test Assertions: The "Show only listings with pictures" checkbox is selected. 

7. Click on the "Apply" button to filter results to only show listings with pictures. 
Test Assertions: All displayed listings include a thumbnail image. 

8. Clear all filters by removing the location, and unchecking the pictures checkbox. 
Test Assertions: All filters are cleared, and the search results are reset. 

9. Click on the "Apply" button 
Test Assertions: The Books listing is displayed with 1489 listings

1. Start on the Homepage: http://da44b037-3c00-41d5-b935-bd6612be4804.pub.instances.scw.cloud:9980/  
Test Assertions: Home page OsClass loads with search bar, category dropdown, and "Login" option visible 

2. Click "Login" button 
Test Assertions: Login page appears with email and password fields 

3. Enter email "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" and password "Password.123", check "Remember me", click "Log in" 
Test Assertions: User is logged in, homepage reloads with "My account" and "Logout" options visible 

4. Enter "camera" in keyword field, select "Photo + video" category, click "Search" 
Test Assertions: Search results page loads with camera listings 

5. Choose "Rochester (Pennsylvania)" from location dropdown, click "Apply" 
Test Assertions: Search results update to show camera listings in Rochester, Pennsylvania 

6. Click on "Camera - Revere 8 mm" listing on the top of the list 
Test Assertions: Detailed listing page opens showing item specifics, price ($20.00), and seller information 

7. Scroll to comment section, enter title "Nice camera" and comment "Nice product", click "Send" 
Test Assertions: Comment submission successful, confirmation message appears 

8. Look for comment approval notification 
Test Assertions: Green notification bar appears stating "Your comment has been approved" 

9. Scroll through listing page to check if your comment is visible 
Test Assertions: A comment "Nice camera by Blake Sullivan" is visible 

10. Delete the comment "Nice camera by Blake Sullivant" 
Test Assertions: Comment list is empty

1. Start on the Homepage: http://da44b037-3c00-41d5-b935-bd6612be4804.pub.instances.scw.cloud:9980/  
Test Assertions: Home page OsClass loads with search bar, category dropdown, and "Login" option visible 

2. Click "Login" button 
Test Assertions: Login page appears with email and password fields 

3. Enter email "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" and password "Password.123", check "Remember me", click "Log in" 
Test Assertions: User is logged in, homepage reloads with "My account" and "Logout" options visible 

4. Enter "camera" in keyword field, select "Photo + video" category, then click "Search" 
Test Assertions: Search results page loads with Photo + video listings 

5. Enter "Falls Church" in City field, then click "Apply" 
Test Assertions: Search results page loads with Photo + video Falls Church listings 

6. Click on "Nikon N50 Camera" in the listing  
Test Assertions: Detailed listing page opens showing item specifics, price ($30.00), and seller information 

7. Scroll to comment section, enter title "Nice camera" and comment "Nice product", click "Send" 
Test Assertions: Green notification bar appears stating "Your comment has been approved" 

8. Scroll through listing page to check if your comment is visible 
Test Assertions: A comment "Nice camera by Blake Sullivan" is visible 

9. Delete the comment "Nice camera by Blake Sullivant" 
Test Assertions: Comment list is empty

1. Start on the Homepage: http://da44b037-3c00-41d5-b935-bd6612be4804.pub.instances.scw.cloud:9980/  
Test Assertions: Home page OsClass loads with search bar, category dropdown, and "Login" option visible 

2. Click "Login" button 
Test Assertions: Login page appears with email and password fields 

3. Enter email "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" and password "Password.123", then click "Log in" 
Test Assertions: User is logged in, homepage reloads with "My account" and "Logout" options visible 

4. Click "Publish Ad" 
Test Assertions: The “Publish a listing” page appears. 

5. Select "Bikes" in the Caterory dropdown. 
Test Assertions: Bikes category is selected. 

6. Enter "Motobecane all Carbon Fiber Shimano GRX equipped gravel bike" in the Title field 
Test Assertions:  

7. Enter "Selling my gorgeous Motobecane Carbon Fiber gravel bike equipped with 1 x 11 Shimano GRX gravel group." in the Description field 
Test Assertions:  

8. Set price at 1,495.00 
Test Assertions: The price is visible at 1,495.00
 

9. Select "California" in the Region dropdown 
Test Assertions: California is selected as region 

10. Select "San Francisco" in the City dropdown 
Test Assertions: San Francisco is selected as city 

11. Click on the "Submit" button 
Test Assertions: Green notification bar appears stating "Your listing has been published" and the new add is visible with two buttons "Edit item" and "Delete" 

12. Click on the "Delete" button visible on the add 
Test Assertions: A pop-up window appears  

13. Click on the "OK" button in the pop-up 
Test Assertions: Green notification bar appears stating "Your listing has been published" and "My listings" page is displayed without the deleted add.
